body:
Comment 2: 
Windows shell is non existent. So if we want to do anything on Windows, we have to use
mingw shell. It means that we have to be prepared that some things that we take for
granted on unix will be broken in mingw on Windows.

I agree, it is not deal breaker, but would be nice to have fixed. Perhaps, someone have
some bright idea how to fix it easy.

Alex
